SEARCH
Package it.polimi.coordinator

Class ProgramExecutor

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.coordinator.ProgramExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ProgramExecutor extends Thread
The ProgramExecutor class is responsible for executing the program. It contains methods to manage the files per worker, initialize the connections, initialize Hadoop, read the operations and manage the end of the program.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    Thread.Builder, Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgramExecutor

      public ProgramExecutor(String outputId, String programId, String op_path, List<Address> addresses, HadoopCoordinator hadoopCoordinator)
      The ProgramExecutor class constructor creates a new ProgramExecutor.
      Parameters:
      outputId - represents the number of the program.
      programId - represents the program id.
      op_path - represents the path of the operations file.
      addresses - represents the list of addresses.
      hadoopCoordinator - represents the hadoop coordinator used to manage the Hadoop file system.

    • manageFilesPerWorker

      private List<String> manageFilesPerWorker(int workerIndex, boolean local)
      The manageFilesPerWorker method returns the files for a specific worker.
      Parameters:
      workerIndex - represents the index of the worker.
      local - represents if the path of the files is local or not.
      Returns:
      the list of files for a specific worker.

    • initializeConnections

      private void initializeConnections()
      The initializeConnections method initializes the connections with the workers.

    • initializeHDFS

      private void initializeHDFS()
      The initializeHDFS method initializes the Hadoop file system and uploads the files to HDFS. If the program has a reduce operation and the change key operation is not present, the files are uploaded to HDFS without merging them. Otherwise, the files are uploaded to HDFS and merged.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while uploading files to HDFS.

    • readOperations

      private boolean readOperations() throws Exception
      The readOperations method reads the operations from the file.
      Returns:
      true if the operations are read correctly, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while reading the operations.

    • run

      public void run()
      The run method executes the program. It initializes the connections, initializes Hadoop, reads the operations and launches the SocketHandlers.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • manageEnd

      public void manageEnd() throws IOException
      The manageEnd method manages the end of the program. If the error is present, the program is aborted. Otherwise, the files are merged and the program is ended.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while managing the end of the program.
